definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: You can also stay in Downward Dog for a breath and then raise into One leg Downward Dog .
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在下犬式停留一个呼吸然后进入单腿下犬式。

sentences.english: You can also stay in Downward Dog for a breath and then raise into One leg Downward Dog .
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在下犬式停留一个呼吸然后进入单腿下犬式。

sentences.english: Adho Mukha Svanasana is one of the poses in the traditional Sun Salutation sequence.
sentences.chinese: 下犬式是传统拜日式中的一个体式。

sentences.english: A participant who presses down too aggressively in downward-facing dog risks tearing shoulder cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 下犬式如果太过于下压也增加肩软骨撕裂的风险。

sentences.english: Stop short of bringing the shoulders over the wrists when moving the bodies weight forward from Downward Dog.
sentences.chinese: 当从下犬式将身体重量前移时不要让肩膀超过手腕。

sentences.english: Hold the pose for 20 seconds or longer, then step back into Adho Mukha Svanasana.
sentences.chinese: 保持20秒或更久，接着，回到下犬式。

sentences.english: This is especially important in such poses as Adho Mukha Svanasana.
sentences.chinese: 这一点在像下犬式似的体式中尤其重要。

sentences.english: Exhale back into One Leg Downward Dog.
